title: #BitcoinVegan
author: #BitcoinVegan
content: I have two transactions stuck in limbo saying waiting for transaction confirmation can someone let me know what maybe going on

comments.author: jseverson
comments.body: How long have they been unconfirmed? Unless you really cut back on the transaction fee, I don't think you should be too concerned. This happens quite a lot especially if there are lots of transactions going on.

comments.author: orarider
comments.body: Quote from: jseverson on October 21, 2017, 01:41:38 AMHow long have they been unconfirmed? Unless you really cut back on the transaction fee, I don't think you should be too concerned. This happens quite a lot especially if there are lots of transactions going on.Yes, recently, bitcoin transactions are confirmed quickly, I do not think there is any other reason except he has cut transaction fees. And that's his fault.

comments.author: AVAMONEY
comments.body: are you doing transaction receive or sending bitcoins?if you means received you are as receiver bitcoins, yes it need about 3-10 confirmations to showing up the balances at your account.

comments.author: #BitcoinVegan
comments.body: Quote from: orarider on October 21, 2017, 01:49:36 AMQuote from: jseverson on October 21, 2017, 01:41:38 AMHow long have they been unconfirmed? Unless you really cut back on the transaction fee, I don't think you should be too concerned. This happens quite a lot especially if there are lots of transactions going on.Yes, recently, bitcoin transactions are confirmed quickly, I do not think there is any other reason except he has cut transaction fees. And that's his fault.It went through not sure what the issue was thanks!!!

comments.author: Psalms23
comments.body: I also had this problem when I was sending my bitcoin to yobit.  It took almost 3 days waiting for confirmations and I was really worried and disappointed since I was in a hurry to buy some altcoins dropping.  I was really wondering what causes these problems because I might encounter something like this in the future.

comments.author: Cimmy_revenger
comments.body: Quote from: #BitcoinVegan on October 21, 2017, 12:21:37 AMI have two transactions stuck in limbo saying waiting for transaction confirmation can someone let me know what maybe going oncan you show me Tx Id ? , I want to check it why your transaction unconfirmed , maybe fee is lower per byte or cost for transaction is cheap.how long you make a transaction ?

comments.author: d_fitrie
comments.body: may be a cheap transaction fee so that the transaction needs to wait for the queue to be in the confidence, at least pairs of transaction fees are a little high so quickly confirmed

comments.author: belford11
comments.body: Quote from: #BitcoinVegan on October 21, 2017, 12:21:37 AMI have two transactions stuck in limbo saying waiting for transaction confirmation can someone let me know what maybe going on where exactly? Do you have a suspicious transaction?

comments.author: Ayaancool
comments.body: It's not a new issue. Recently bitcoin transaction confirmations are coming quickly if it's lagging I don't know the exact reason but I think it's because of the transaction fee, I mean you may forget to pay the transaction fee.

comments.author: NewBet
comments.body: Maybe there is really cheap fees on the transaction so it has to wait on the queue until the transactions with the higher fees go through then yours will go through once it's been confirmed on a block. Also are you sure the transactions were made to right wallets? You know if you make transactions to a wrong wallet then those coins are lost forever.
